name: Colourless
description: Once Upon A Time, There Was A land Called colourland. The citizens,praised and love the coloursphere which made everything colourful. But nobody knew... the black and white days... were about to come...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP,7,8,10 Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
